summary: Most core requirements appear implemented: red primary Tailwind variables, premium header with PEGASUS GIFTING + red logo, a guided chat-led branching flow with quick replies, category cards, and WhatsApp handoff labeled “Speak to Our Team” with a prefilled message. However, at least one required asset (favicon) is not evidenced, and the “Unsure” path includes delivery-related copy that violates the constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not include delivery promises or timelines in the Unsure/Exploration “How It Works” explanation shown inside the guided conversation.
missing_requirements.reason: The unsure path’s system message explicitly mentions handling “production & delivery,” which is delivery-focused copy disallowed by the constraints and explicitly called out to be removed/rewritten in REQ-6 AC.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required red Pegasus favicon icon asset (pegasus-favicon-red.dim_64x64.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows usage of the red logo asset in the header, but no evidence of adding or referencing the required favicon asset anywhere (e.g., in public assets or HTML head).

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution linking to caffeine.ai (“Built with … using caffeine.ai”).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest and adds extra branding/attribution content.

hallucinated_features.description: Placeholder React Query hook file for future backend integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (non-goals include avoiding building extra systems like admin/database; while this isn’t that, it’s still unrequested scaffolding).
